content: rts stuff the head tightly y d a e r s i d a e h e h t pag e 3 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart neck r19 brown press the opening of the head 7 sts work in row together and crochet the head together with 7 single_crochet please see the picture how to do it you will miss one stitch in the begining and one in the end r20 brown chain increase single_crochet 5 increase 9 sts r19 brown chain increase single_crochet 7 increase 11 sts r19 brown chain single_crochet 11 11 sts pag e 4 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart legs now start a leg the four legs are crocheted similarly 1st leg leg r1 brown chain 13 13 sts leg r2 brown skip the 1st st 16 sts you are ready with this leg single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 in the second st single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 7 r20 brown single_crochet 11 11 sts you crochet this row on the r19 2nd leg leg r1 brown chain 13 13 sts leg r2 brown skip the 1st st 16 sts you are ready with this leg single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 in the second st single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 7 g e l t s 1 e h t g n i t r a t s pag e 5 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart body r21-r60 brown chain single_crochet 11 11 sts this is the main part of the body you can crochet more or less row as you like legs 3rd leg leg r1 brown chain 13 13 sts leg r2 brown skip the 1st st 16 sts you are ready with this leg single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 in the second st single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 7 r61 brown single_crochet 11 11 sts you crochet this row on the r60 4th leg leg r1 brown chain 13 13 sts 13 sts leg r2 brown skip the 1st st 16 sts you are ready with this leg single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 in the second st single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 7 l i a t e h t e k a m o t w o h pag e 6 | 9 crochet daschund bookmark | fonalart body and tail r62 brown single_crochet 11 11 sts you crochet this row on the r61 r63 brown slip_stitch 5 5 sts this is almost the middle of the body now make the tail tail r1 brown chain 25 25 sts tail r2 brown skip 1 st slip_stitch 8 single_crochet 8 half_double_crochet 8 24 sts sew the tail correctly to the body as you see on the picture fasten_off leave long thread for sewing eyes make two pieces eye r1 white 5 single_crochet in magic_ring 5 sts eye r2 white *increase* repeat 5 times 10 sts eye r3 white 10 single_crochet 10 sts fasten_off leave long thread for sewing collar work in spiral rounds collar r1 yellow make ring with 16
